summary: A nearly-suicidal, young woman visits a psychotherapist. She is in love with a priest, and the diagnosis of her husband's mental illness leaves no hope. The psychotherapist, in her attempts... See full summary »
cast: Rasa Samuolyte|Aleksas Kazanavicius|Nele Savicenko|Kostas Smoriginas|Remigijus Sabulis|Romas Ramanauskas|Toma Vaskeviciute|Rolandas Boravskis|Darius Petkevicius|Adomas Stancikas|Gediminas Vilaniskis|Irmantas Jankaitis|Loreta Juodkaite|Irena Zitkute|Virginija Vareikyte|Juozas Rimas|Donatas Simukauskas|Ramunas Cicenas|Julija Stefanoviciene
title: Nuodemes uzkalbejimas
